## InteractionChecker class

An interaction checker that aims to be as strict as possible. It is designed to catch programmer errors such as: - incorrect types of contract call arguments - errors related to calling "non-payable" functions with some value provided - gas estimation errors (not yet implemented)

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare class InteractionChecker 
```
